alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 3:54PM CDT until June 03 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southwestern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... North central Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Midland City, or near Headland, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Headland, Dothan, Midland City, Kinsey, Newton, Pinckard, Grimes, Newville, Napier Field, Sylvan Grove, Kirkland Crossroads, Blackwood, Kelly Springs, Headland Municipal A/P, W. Main/brannon St, Currytown and Goldberg Field. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
